WED, Wednus Extreme Debugger

Detailed Description

These are various loaders with different purposes.


Variables

W error
 (nothing fancy) alert error message
W onerror
W halt
 Halt platform.
W dump
 Return HTML code representation of Wednus object tree.

Variable Documentation

W error
 

Initial value:

 function(where, what){
    alert(what +'\n'+ where);
}
(nothing fancy) alert error message

Parameters:
where indicate the place it occurred
what error message

Definition at line 14 of file system.js.

W onerror
 

Initial value:

 function (msg, url, linenumber, sysMsg){
  var message = '[WEDNUS] ';                 
  if(typeof sysMsg == 'undefined') message += 'An Internal Error Detected.\n\n\n';
  else message = sysMsg +'\n\n\n';
  message += 'Error: '+ msg +'\n\nLocation: '+url+' (Line:'+linenumber+')\n\n';
  alert(message);
  return true;
}

Definition at line 20 of file system.js.

W halt
 

Initial value:

 function(isBroadcast){
    var undefined;
    W = undefined;
    if(isBroadcast){
        document.write('Wednus Platform has halted.');
        document.write('<br><br>');
        for(var i in window)
            document.write(i +', ');
        document.close();
    }
}
Halt platform.

Parameters:
isBroadcast flag for enable displaying halting message

Definition at line 36 of file system.js.

W dump
 

Initial value:

 function(){
    return this.root.innerHTML;
}
Return HTML code representation of Wednus object tree.

Returns:
html HTML code
